overview_of_class: This course examines current theories in cognitive psychology, including theories of concepts, reasoning, decision-making, and problem-solving. It focuses on deriving empirical test of these theories and designing experiments to carry out the tests.
name: Psychology of Thinking
title: WCAS PSYCH 333-0-20 Psychology of Thinking
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: PRE-REG: Reserved for Psychology or Cognitive Science Majors or Minors.
